data.message: Yall are not fans if you think this is the first time he dissed him.think again fuckin losers.He dissed Trump on a track last year too.where was yall cry baby asses at then?😂😂😂yall aint fans!!!😂😂

replies.message: Exactly! Everyone's bitching bc he "sold out" by talking politics. He's ALWAYS talked politics.
I see that the school system failed you...........
Stringing up ur mom's where I was, strange fruit swinging from the willow trees!
He dissed Trump. This time his dissed all his supporters too. Your GED was not enough to tell the difference. Sorry, was too busy making money and not watching BET
Tiffany Fisher. I don't care that he talked Politics, he bashed Clinton, Bush, Chaney, etc too. This time, he turned on his fans. That's the difference
I dont care that your little feelings are hurt lmao
Maureen Gavaghan Cadzow, I see the beautician failed you.
He's talked shit to his fans before and no one batted an eye. It's bc your precious Trump was involved.
And he didn't diss all his supporters, just the ones that support Trump.

And only the one who can't decide who they like more.

Basically he's saying if you prefer trump as a person he's insulted and would rather you didn't buy his art.

He's always exaggerated but that's what he meant.

What he can kill his girlfriend in a track and diss his mom but you thought YOU were safe? Lmao.
